segments.text: I notice the girl standing nearby, her open palm raised toward the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's an excitement in her posture I can almost feel from across the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a secret plan between them, stealing cookies while the woman is distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem so innocent, yet I can’t help but feel a bit of disgust at the sneaky behavior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what would happen if the woman turned around right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The moment feels charged, like the air before a storm hits.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Will they pay for their mischief? I wish I could warn them.
segments.speaker: PAR
